Articles.Content:
Hello Reader!

I bought the game yesterday, and played with a lot of joy (just like the first game)! Today, launching the game again, there is no save file. Thinking I made a mistake, I started a new career. While doing the first Mun mission I save the game, but when trying to reload, there is no save file. I'm not talking about quick-save and quick-load (I quickly learned they aint working). I press esc, press save, give it a logical name (now that I write this I realize I used spaces) and press save. 

Sadly there is no game to load, neither a career to continue playing.

my apologies if there is an elaborate thread somewhere. The searchbar didn't bring me anything useful.

Kind regards

 

Specs:
Windows 11 Pro
Ryzen Threadripper 2920X
RTX2080 GamingX
32gygs of RAM
Game is installed on a 1Tb M2

Edited December 23, 2023 by I, the Breather
Typo's

Ì found the solution.. 

By firstly testing with a sandbox game called "test" Autosaves were created. Starting an exploration career with a name that is 1 word as well, saving manually workes as well. 

So the problem is the spaces in the name. Pretty happy, also cause there is no check or warning about using certain characters, but this seems to solve the problem.
